Docs.param: Name of the color space, cannot be null, its length must be >= 1
3x3 column-major transform matrix from RGB to the profile connection space CIE XYZ as an array of 9 floats, cannot be null
Gamma to use as the transfer function
Docs.summary: Creates a new RGB color space using a 3x3 column-major transform matrix.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: Name of the color space, cannot be null, its length must be >= 1
RGB primaries as an array of 6 (xy) or 9 (XYZ) floats
Reference white as an array of 2 (xy) or 3 (XYZ) floats
Gamma to use as the transfer function
Docs.summary: Creates a new RGB color space using a specified set of primaries and a specified white point.
